overview: Eddie Stone is left an estate in Mallorca after a wealthy Aunt suddenly dies. He hires a staff of Spanish houseboys to cater to his every want and need. Riky, the newest houseboy, brings Eddie his breakfast and soon Riky is the one that is being served for breakfast. The two go right at it and Eddie leaves the young houseboy aching for more. Eddie's friend from Berlin, Tommy Ritter, arrives at the sprawling estate with a hot piece of ass, Jan Fischer. Tommy gets right to the action and makes full use of the houseboys. He jumps right into a threeway with huge uncut studs Lucas Foz and Marcos David. On the other end of the estate, Jan is playing hard to get and resists a come-on by house boy Filippo Romano. Eddie witnesses the rejection and says that no-one in his house will play that way. They are here for one reason, and that reason is pure unadulterated sex.
title: Master of the House
